title: MindScript Provenance
description: Audit trail entries that describe how data was produced. Versions follow SemVer; increment major for breaking changes, minor for additive changes, and patch for clarifications.

timestamp.description: ISO-8601 timestamp for when the entry was recorded.

actor.description: Identifier for the agent or system that created the entry.

note.description: Short explanation of the provenance event.

data.description: Optional structured data captured alongside the event.
